name: Eye Dropper
description: Layer that lets users sample colors from the screen with preview adornments.

use: you need an eye-dropper inside a color picker.
you want a magnified preview and picked-color label.
avoid: a simple color input is enough.

examples.minimal:
EyeDropperLayer(
  child: const MyApp(),
  previewLabelBuilder: (context, color) => Text(colorToHex(color)),
)

patterns.title: Prompt for a pick
patterns.code:
final scope = EyeDropperLayerScope.find(context);
final color = await scope.promptPickColor();

theming: Follows typography and surface tokens from `Theme.of(context)`.
accessibility: Provide textual feedback for picked colors when possible.
do: Use `previewLabelBuilder` to show readable color values.
dont: Activate the eye dropper without a clear exit path.
